pkgmetadata.longdescription: Combine Multiple GWAS by Using Gene-Environment Interactions // Classical methods for combining summary data from genome-wide association studies (GWAS) only use marginal genetic effects and power can be compromised in the presence of heterogeneity. 'subgxe' is a R package that implements p-value assisted subset testing for association (pASTA), a method developed by Yu et al. (2019) doi:10.1159/000496867. pASTA generalizes association analysis based on subsets by incorporating gene-environment interactions into the testing procedure.
